We launched a brand new and much more complete version:
- New layout to make the app even easier to use;
- New string to string tuning format: select the string you want to tune to focus on one string at a time. You can even listen to its sound!
- Cifra Club Sponsor: become a sponsor and gain access to all new features of the app, in addition to not seeing more banners in any Cifra Club application. Try it!
- If you have already bought the older version of the Tuner, don't worry: all previous features will remain free! New features of this version will only be available for sponsors.

We launched a brand new and much more complete version:
- New layout to make the app even easier to use;
- New string to string tuning format: select the string you want to tune to focus on one string at a time. You can even listen to its sound!
- Cifra Club Sponsor: become a sponsor and gain access to all new features of the app, in addition to not seeing more banners in any Cifra Club application. Try it!
- If you have already bought the older version of the Tuner, don't worry: all previous features will remain free and we won't show you ads! Because of technical limitations, this change will only work for those who have used the tuner in the past 30 days before the update. If you continue to see ads after updating the app to the latest version, contact us so we can help you. Remember: the new features of this version are only available to sponsors.

We've added more navigation tabs so you can switch to other options of the Tuner more easily. We've also optimized audio pickup on the bass guitar to help you even more to get the right musical tone.

New feature: music games! Now you will be able to use our tuner even without your instrument.
Enjoy the app and train your ear to improve your musical perception.

Also, we launched Cifra Club Pro, the membership with exclusive benefits on Cifra Club's apps and website.

We launched Cifra Club Pro, the membership with exclusive benefits on Cifra Club's apps and website.

If you were a Sponsor, don't worry. Everything works the same way as before, but now your membership is called Cifra Club Pro and your benefits will be available on any platform, not only on the device that you purchased your membership.
